verses.verse: Moreover <S%H5307><s%>, when ye shall divide by lot the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> an oblation <S%H8641><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, a holy portion <S%H6944><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; the length <S%H753><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> reeds <S%H7341><s%>, and the breadth shall be ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>: it shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> in all the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Of this there shall be for the holy place <S%H6944><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> in length by five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> in breadth <S%H7251><s%>, square round about <S%H5439><s%>; and fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> for the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And of this measure <S%H4060><s%> shalt thou measure <S%H4058><s%> a length <S%H753><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, and a breadth <S%H7341><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>: and in it shall be the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, which is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

It is a holy <S%H6944><s%> portion of the land <S%H776><s%>; it shall be for the priests <S%H3548><s%>, the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, that come near <S%H7131><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and it shall be a place <S%H4725><s%> for their houses <S%H1004><s%>, and a holy place <S%H4720><s%> for the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>.

And five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length <S%H753><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth <S%H7341><s%>, shall be unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, for a possession <S%H272><s%> unto themselves <S%H6242><s%>, for twenty chambers <S%H3957><s%>.

And ye shall appoint <S%H5414><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, side by side <S%H5980><s%> with the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion <S%H1004><s%>: it shall be for the whole house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And whatsoever is for the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall be on the one side and on the other side of the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%> and of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, in front <S%H6440><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%> and in front <S%H6440><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and on the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> eastward <S%H6921><s%>; and in length <S%H753><s%> answerable <S%H5980><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> of the portions <S%H2506><s%>, from the west <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> unto the east <S%H6921><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>.

In the land <S%H776><s%> it shall be to him for a possession <S%H272><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and my princes <S%H5387><s%> shall no more oppress <S%H3238><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>; but they shall give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their tribes <S%H7626><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Let it suffice <S%H7227><s%> you <S%H5387><s%>, O princes of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: remove <S%H5493><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> and spoil <S%H7701><s%>, and execute <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%>; take away <S%H7311><s%> your exactions <S%H1646><s%> from my people <S%H5971><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
Ye shall have just <S%H6664><s%> balances <S%H3976><s%>, and a just <S%H6664><s%> ephah <S%H374><s%>, and a just <S%H6664><s%> bath <S%H1324><s%>.

The ephah <S%H374><s%> and the bath <S%H1324><s%> shall be of one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H8506><s%>, that the bath <S%H1324><s%> may contain <S%H5375><s%> the tenth part <S%H4643><s%> of a homer <S%H2563><s%>, and the ephah <S%H374><s%> the tenth part <S%H6224><s%> of a homer <S%H2563><s%>: the measure <S%H4971><s%> thereof shall be after the homer <S%H2563><s%>.

And the shekel <S%H8255><s%> shall be twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>; twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, fifteen <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, shall be your maneh <S%H4488><s%>.

This is the oblation <S%H8641><s%> that ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%>: the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> from a homer <S%H2563><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%>; and ye shall give the sixth part <S%H8341><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> from a homer <S%H2563><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%>;

and the set portion <S%H2706><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>, of the bath <S%H1324><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>, the tenth part <S%H4643><s%> of a bath <S%H1324><s%> out of the cor <S%H3734><s%>, which is ten <S%H6235><s%> baths <S%H1324><s%>, even a homer <S%H2563><s%>; (for ten <S%H6235><s%> baths <S%H1324><s%> are a homer <S%H2563><s%>;)

and one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H7716><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%>, out of two hundred <S%H3967><s%>, from the well-watered <S%H4945><s%> pastures of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;â€”for a meal-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and for a burnt-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and for peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
All the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall give unto this oblation <S%H8641><s%> for the prince <S%H5387><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it shall be the prince <S%H5387><s%>'s part to give the burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and the meal-offerings <S%H4503><s%>, and the drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%>, in the feasts <S%H2282><s%>, and on the new moons <S%H2320><s%>, and on the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, in all the appointed feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the burnt-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and the peace-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: In the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H259><s%>, in the first day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> a young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>; and thou shalt cleanse <S%H2398><s%> the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the door-posts <S%H4201><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and upon the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> of the ledge <S%H5835><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and upon the posts <S%H4201><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>.

And so thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> on the seventh <S%H7651><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%> for every one <S%H376><s%> that erreth <S%H7686><s%>, and for him that is simple <S%H6612><s%>: so shall ye make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%>.

In the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H702><s%>, in the fourteenth day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, ye shall have the passover <S%H6453><s%>, a feast <S%H2282><s%> of seven <S%H7620><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%>.

And upon that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the prince <S%H5387><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> for himself and for all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; and a <S%H8163><s%> he-goat <S%H5795><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram <S%H352><s%>, and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah <S%H374><s%>.

In the seventh <S%H7651><s%> month <S%H2568><s%>, in the fifteenth day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, in the feast <S%H2282><s%>, shall he do <S%H6213><s%> the like the seven <S%H7637><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; according to the sin-offering <S%H5930><s%>, according to the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and according to the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and according to the oil <S%H8081><s%>.
